text: Mychael Danna (born September 20, 1958) is a Canadian composer of film and television score. == Early life and education == Danna was born in Winnipeg, Manitoba and raised in Burlington, Ontario. == Career == Danna served for five years as composer-in-residence at the McLaughlin Planetarium in Toronto. == Personal life == Danna's wife Aparna is of Indian origin; the couples have sons and reside in Vancouver, British Columbia. == Other websites == * Category:1958 births Category:Canadian composers Category:Living people Category:Movie score composers Category:Musicians from Winnipeg Category:University of Toronto alumni
title: Mychael Danna
